text: Zosep ana thamthar zav wo ndav vhera mba ndɨkndɨga mbuav ki. Ana mba ndɨkndɨga mbuav kim, maan Fhe Bakɨme enser mbe rɨman ana kharigi. Ana rɨman ana kharav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Zosep, Devitan nzɨk, ndu Marian rɨgɨrgen rɨvɨ thari. Ndu mbarara! Maria ndavar ki tar, Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar nduara mba tarar ana ndava vhee sarigi.
